Comments_List: This course teaches basic to intermediate conversational skills in modern Greek.
We finished elementary grammar, ending the semester with the past tense.  Learned reading comprehension, auditory comprehension, writing, speaking.

This was overall a great course but it must be said that the book we used was pretty annoying. Instead of giving you the chapter's vocab in a list or chart or picture, it interspersed it throughout passages and exercises, which made it a huge chore to go back and study. I ended up mostly just studying from my in-class notes. I would recommend using a different textbook in the future.
Yes! It's a fun class and it's usually pretty small so you get a lot of good practice in.
Would definitely recommend!  Maria is great!! She makes the early mornings worth it.  And with the small class, you really learn greek.
